LeBron James surpassed Michael Jordan for the most 30-point games in NBA history with 563.
LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for the most 30-point games in NBA history with his 563rd 30-point game.
LeBron James surpassed Michael Jordan's mark for most 30-point games in league history with 563 games.
LeBron James moved into fourth place for the most number of games played in the NBA with 1,523 games.
